attributes.action: 7 Labour MPs who resigned must face by-election. It's the honourable thing to do
attributes.additional_details:
Although Parliament prepared a brief on members leaving their parties, it stop short of proposing a constitutional reform to ensure that MP's being delegates of their own parties should not be allowed to derail their parties manifesto, especially during a crucial moment like Brexit.
https://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/SN02537

We owe the public an orderly deliberations during Brexit, the most harmful Black-Swan event in recent generations.
attributes.background:
The following MPs, Chuka Umunna, Luciana Berger, Chris Leslie, Angela Smith, Mike Gapes, Gavin Shuker & Ann Coffey resigned from the Labour Party today.
They were elected into the Parliament on the Labour Party manifesto, if they no longer support their terms of employment, they must resign.
